metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21897 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the DL_Dxf::handleLWPolylineData functionality of Ribbonsoft dxflib 3.17.0. A specially-crafted .dxf file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: dxflib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
